description: Creates a Nameserver host in the registry.
availability: Some registries store nameserver hosts as dedicated objects. For such registries you need to create nameserver host objects before you can use them. If you own the domain example.com and you would like to use the nameservers ns1.example.com and ns2.example.com you will have to create each of the nameserver host objects with an AddNameserver command. It is necessary to provide the respective IP addresses for each nameserver with the command.
